item.title: How Qualytics Builds Product
item.description: It’s been four years since our first product demo at Qualytics and as we’ve developed our eponymous product into an enterprise offering, we’ve refined our process in lockstep. I didn’t build our team around a manifesto but around a shared mission. We started with customer problems and pushed to deliver robust solutions quickly without breaking things (too badly).
